name: Playing Tennis
description: Tennis is a racket sport that is played either individually against a single opponent (singles) or between two teams of two players each (doubles).

name: Running
description: Running is a method of terrestrial locomotion allowing humans and other animals to move rapidly on foot.

name: Boxing
description: Boxing is a combat sport in which two people, usually wearing protective gloves and other protective equipment.

name: Swimming
description: Swimming is an individual or team racing sport that requires the use of one's entire body to move through water.

name: Fencing
description: Fencing is a group of three related combat sports.

name: Harding Murphy
description: Cycling can help to protect you from serious diseases such as stroke, heart attack, some cancers, depression, diabetes, obesity and arthritis.
